00004 #define NETSNMP_SPECIFIER_INDEX            0xa0
00005 #define NETSNMP_SPECIFIER_ELEMENT          0xa1
00006 #define NETSNMP_SPECIFIER_SUBELEMENT       0xa2
00007 #define NETSNMP_SPECIFIER_MULTSUBELEMENT   0xa3
00008 #define NETSNMP_SPECIFIER_SUBELEMENT_INDEX 0xa4
00009 typedef struct netsnmp_oops_options_s {
00010 } netsnmp_oops_options;

00012 struct netsnmp_oops_element_list_s; /* forw decl */
00013 
00014 typedef struct netsnmp_oops_element_specifier_s {
00015    long                             type;
00016    union {
00017       u_long                              index_number;
00018       u_long                              element_number;
00019       oid                             *subelement_specifier;
00020 
00021       struct {
00022          oid                                     *element_specifier;
00023          size_t                                   element_specifier_len;
00024          struct netsnmp_oops_element_list_s      *element_list;
00025       }                                multiple_subelement;
00026 
00027       struct {
00028          oid                                     *element_specifier;
00029          size_t                                   element_specifier_len;
00030          u_long                                      element_index_number;
00031       }                                subelement_index;
00032 
00033    }                               specifier;
00034    size_t                          specifier_len; /* bytes */
00035 } netsnmp_oops_element_specifier;
00036 
00037 typedef struct netsnmp_oops_element_list_s {
00038    struct netsnmp_oops_element_list_s *next;
00039 
00040    netsnmp_oops_element_specifier      specifier;
00041 } netsnmp_oops_element_list;

00043 typedef struct netsnmp_oops_search_criteria_s {
00044    u_long                                 match_type;
00045    union {
00046       struct netsnmp_oops_search_criteria_s  *sub_criteria;
00047 
00048       struct {
00049          netsnmp_oops_element_specifier          *which;
00050          netsnmp_vardata                          what;
00051       } match_data;
00052    } match_data;
00053 } netsnmp_oops_search_criteria;
00054 
00055 typedef struct netsnmp_oops_gopobjects_s {
00056    struct netsnmp_oops_gopobjects_s  *next;
00057 
00058    /* handling info */
00059    u_long                                max_return_objects;
00060    u_long                                skip_objects;   
00061    char                              *cursor;
00062    size_t                             cursor_len;
00063    char                               request_flags[1];
00064    netsnmp_oops_options               option_field;
00065 
00066    /* request info */
00067    oid                               *request_base_OID;
00068    size_t                             request_base_OID_len;
00069    netsnmp_oops_element_list         *request_element_list;
00070    netsnmp_oops_search_criteria      *search_criteria;
00071 } netsnmp_oops_gopojects;
